unnormalised: Interesting article! I've been exploring Ayurveda too. Heard good things about treatments at Kerala Ayurveda near Kochi. My aunt, Priya, went in 2022 and felt amazing! Thinking of going sometime around Diwali, maybe November 12th?  Did you try any specific therapies, like Shirodhara?  My friend, Rohan, recommended it after his visit on 01/01/2023. Need to consult with a Vaidya first, I guess. Hopefully, by 03:00 PM tomorrow, I'll have more info.
normalised: Interesting article! I've been exploring Ayurveda too. Heard good things about treatments at Kerala Ayurveda near Kochi. My aunt, Priya, went in two thousand and twenty two and felt amazing! Thinking of going sometime around Diwali, maybe twelfth November? Did you try any specific therapies, like Shirodhara? My friend, Rohan, recommended it after his visit on first January two thousand and twenty three. Need to consult with a Vaidya first, I guess. Hopefully, by three P M tomorrow, I'll have more info.
